snippet: Mrs. Rasmuson, one of the original officers of the corps, went on to serve as its director, before moving to Alaska and beginning a new life as a philanthropist.
abstract: Mary Louise Rasmuson, leader of the Women's Army Corps and Alaska civic leader and philanthropist, dies at age 101.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Rasmuson, one of the original officers of the corps, went on to serve as its director, before moving to Alaska and beginning a new life as a philanthropist.

headline.seo: Mary Louise Rasmuson, Led Women’s Army Corps, Dies at 101
headline.main: Mary Louise Rasmuson, Who Led Women’s Army Corps, Dies at 101
